title: LF Clash Team (ADC Diamond 2)
body:
Hey guys! I'm in dire need of a clash team for the weekends (Both Saturday and Sunday)

I have discord as well, will PM deets if anyone takes me

Please take me I'm desperate

I am currently diamond 2 but i really do not care what tier or ranks I'm playing with. looking for any clash team high or low rank 

These are my main champions I play
{{champion:119}}  {{champion:51}}  {{champion:202}}  {{champion:235}}  {{champion:145}}  {{champion:236}} 

IGN  is Anthony Chen
